plot: John Oliver examines the misuse of opioid settlement funds by state and local governments, highlighting systemic flaws and proposing solutions to combat the opioid crisis effectively.

John Oliver discusses how state and local governments in the United States of America are currently spending the money from opioid settlements, and pointed out the flaws in the system and how to tackle those issues for the sake of tackling the opioid crisis.—Niaz Islam Arif
